description: An issue was discovered in Atos Unify OpenScape SBC 9 and 10 before 10R2.2.1, Atos Unify OpenScape Branch 9 and 10 before version 10R2.1.1, and Atos Unify OpenScape BCF 10 before 10R9.12.1. A remote code execution vulnerability may allow an unauthenticated attacker (with network access to the admin interface) to disrupt system availability or potentially compromise the confidentiality and integrity of the system.
